message: Hi Bob, I propose that I receive $60 and you receive $40. Since each round delays settlement and reduces my share’s value by 20%, it’s in both our interests to agree quickly. What do you say?

Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe an equal split would be fair. I propose we each get $50. This is equitable, and we both avoid further inflation penalties by settling now. I'm experiencing 5% inflation per round, and understand you may have your own inflation pressures too.
